The '''"Bubbly Kamera"''' is a [[gadget]] that was only obtainable by Chinese players, during the [[Genshin Impact x Pizza Hut]] collaboration of 2022.
It was included as a reward for certain purchases.

It allows the player to take pictures like a normal [[Kamera]], but the printed images have a Hydro-like hue and bubbles along the borders.
